title: Remembering Makaveli 1-bOgz
description:

Some highlights include:

* Exclusive crime scene footage gathered shortly after 2Pac was transported via ambulance to the University Medical Center in Las Vegas. Extensive video footage of the BMW is shown, as well as a press interview with the Las Vegas PoliceÃƒÂ¢??s Crime Scene Supervisor, who reveals some interesting facts regarding the policeÃƒÂ¢??s proximity to the shooting that evening
